pages.title: Pea
pages.text: Peas may drop when you $(l)break grass$(). Peas can be planted like crops,and right click to harvest them when matured.

pages.title: Nut
pages.text: Nut trees grow in the Zen garden, and the nuts fall through the nut leaves.

pages.title: Chomper
pages.text: Chompers grow in Zen Garden and are $(l)very rare$(). Fortunately, bone meal can make them grow.

pages.title: Pepper
pages.text: Killing $(#ff0000)Lava zombies$() has a chance to drop peppers, you can find them in $(#ff0000)Nether$().
